rows.label: tlk4440008902_msg0001
rows.name:
Now then class, I want you to express
your own concept of true beauty
through prose. Let me demonstrate.

rows.label: tlk4440008902_msg0002
rows.name: He rose, slender as a Gypsum Branch...

rows.label: tlk4440008902_msg0003
rows.name:
Crimson lips parted, he whispered,
softly, words that flowed like
Melosian Honey...

rows.label: tlk4440008902_msg0004
rows.name:
His eyes, fierce Pione Stones, fixated
upon me...

rows.label: tlk4440008902_msg0005
rows.name:
Ahh... It's so beautiful... My heart...
I don't care if we're in class, this is
simply...
